Item.comments: re-generate has_sub_sections flag on all Document Section items - SQL
Item.method_code:
' Use Run Method action
' Data Administration tool Dim SQLstr As String = "" Dim inn As Innovator = Me.getInnovator() 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
' select Item Sub Folder relationship SQLstr = "SELECT DISTINCT [Document_Hierarchy].source_id FROM [Document_Hierarchy]" Dim res As Item = inn.applySQL(SQLstr) If res.getItemCount() = 0 Then Return inn.newResult("No Sub Sections relationship items found!") If res.isError() Then Return inn.newError(res.getErrorString())
'build list of ids Dim i As Integer Dim IdsToUpdate As String = "##" For i=0 To res.getItemCount() -1 IdsToUpdate= IdsToUpdate & "," & res.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("source_id","") Next i
IdsToUpdate = IdsToUpdate.Replace(",,",",") IdsToUpdate = IdsToUpdate.Replace("##,","")
IdsToUpdate = "'" & IdsToUpdate.Replace(",","','") & "'"
'Return inn.newResult(IdsToUpdate)
SQLstr = SQLstr & " UPDATE [DOCUMENT_SECTION] Set [DOCUMENT_SECTION].has_sub_sections='1' WHERE [DOCUMENT_SECTION].id in (" & IdsToUpdate & ")" res = inn.applySQL(SQLstr) If res.isError() Then Return inn.newError(res.getErrorString())
Return inn.newResult("DONE")
